name: Roulette Simulator 2
description: Roulette Simulator 2 is the redesigned fan-favorite simulation that allows players to enjoy a modern Roulette gambling experience. Players can continue to experience the thrills of roulette in real-time as the roulette wheel is back in the second edition of Roulette Simulator!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Pentium 4 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Integrated
